column1: Ronchi dashes down the track and clouts it over the wide long-on boundary for six
pushed through outside off, Ronchi drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps it up and over deep square leg for back-to-back sixes
back of a length and outside off, stabbed back to the bowler
uses his feet and drives down to long-on
just short of a good length and outside off, forced through midwicket off the back foot
pretty full on middle and leg, knocked away towards midwicket off the front foot
slower ball floated outside leg, glanced to short fine leg. There's a direct hit, but Rizwan is in, having undone his steps in time
down the track and belted away to mid-off
short and skids back in, cramps the batsman for room, Ronchi chops an inside edge onto his boot
back of a length on middle, punched away in the air to mid-on. They take on Afridi's arm for the single
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line
Irfan hits a hard length outside off, neither driveable nor pullable, Rizwan can only splice a catch to short cover
inswinging yorker from Irfan, beats Delport for pace and has him falling over, but this is heading down the leg side
another ripping inswinging yorker, plunges on Delport, he now manages to jam it out to the leg side to close out the over
Ronchi ventures down the track, Shafiq drags his length back and chases the moving batsman. Beaten in the end
slower offcutter, on a length on off, patted away to mid-on off the front foot
hip-high short ball on off stump, Ronchi swivels on the back foot and pulls it away to deep square leg
just short of a good length and outside off, punched through the line but straight to mid-off

What have you done, Delport? This is a poor ball. Hip-high delivery on leg stump, picked up and flicked in the air. But it does on Irfan at short fine leg. He dives forward and plucks the catch inches from the ground
full and on off, shooter, run away towards backward point from the crease
back of a length and slanting away outside off, Ronchi presses forward and guides the ball towards point
shorter and outside off, steered to the right of deep third man with the angle
back of a length, angling in from wide of the crease, and then straightening away past the outside edge
back of a length and angling in at off, punched up to mid-off. They pinch a single thanks to a ricochet off the stumps
short and outside off, does not come onto the bat. Ronchi goes on the back foot and drags a pull only as far as midwicket
dug in short on middle, pulled more firmly, but Ronchi can't get it past deep square leg
short and darted outside off, chopped off the back foot to sweeper cover
back of a length and outside off, shovelled off the back foot to midwicket
on a length and outside off, worked off the back foot to the leg side
hip-high short ball outside off, skids off the pitch. Ronchi sizes it up and smites a pull over midwicket
speared on a back of a length on off, stabbed back to the bowler
googly, takes the inside edge and rolls away to the leg side
short and wide outside off, scythed away to the left of sweeper
back of a length and outside off, sits up to be hit. Ronchi swivels on the back foot and clubs a pull over deep midwicket
overpitched on off, Ronchi gets under it and lifts it nice and clean over the long-off boundary. Right in the swinging arc and put away
Ronchi continues to lay into Russell. Another hip-high short ball, on off, pulled away to the midwicket boundary with great authority
back of a length on off, stabbed away to the right of the bowler. Islamabad 57 for 2, Ronchi 50 off 31 balls
dug in short and outside off, hooked away to deep square leg. 20 off the over
clipped off the hips to the right of short fine leg
back of a length and outside off, slapped down to long-off
googly, pitches on middle and breaks away to catch the pad, but it isn't threatening the stumps
back of a length and outside off, stabbed back to the bowler
whipped off the hips to deep midwicket
Ronchi holes out to deep square leg. Pushed through on off stump, non-turner, Ronchi drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps hard but can't clear Junaid in the outfield
on a length and outside off, chipped away to deep midwicket

Afridi pulls out a blinding catch at short midwicket! Umpire's referral here. Afridi claims the catch and the soft signal is out. He dives forward and plucks it inches from the ground. He does well to wrap his fingers around the ball. Stunning grab from Afridi. Chipped away in the air and here comes Afridi's athletic intervention
back of a length on the pads, picked away to deep midwicket for a double
on a length and just a shade outside off, guided off the face to point
back of a length and slanting away outside off, Shadab hangs back and glides a single down to deep third man
short and slanted in at off from round the wicket, inside-edged away to fine leg
back of a length and skids on off, goes on the back foot and punches to sweeper cover

Afridi cleans Salt up. Quick fizzer from Afridi, gathers more pace after pitching, back of a length, Salt shuffles across off and does not make contact with a scoop. Replays indicate that was the seam-up variety from Afridi. He hits the top of leg stump
seam-up, on off, guided to point
googly, worked to square leg with the spin
short and outside off, punched up to the covers
short legbreak outside off, chopped to backward point
back of a length on middle, punched down to long-on
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line, straight of mid-off
rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and secures a single to deep third man
Charles throws himself to his right and grabs a low catch. Fuller than a good length and nips away just enough to take the outside edge. Lovely ball from Junaid, lovely catch from Charles
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to extra-cover
on a length and outside off, angled down to deep third man by Samit Patel
dropped short and breaks away outside off, punched to point
fractionally short and outside off, flayed away to sweeper cover off the back foot
googly, dips sharply, poked back to the bowler
shorter and turns away outside off, chopped off the back foot to backward point
Afridi drops a return catch. On a length and breaks away outside off, scooped back to the bowler, who drops a fairly regulation chance
back of a length and outside off, slapped on the up to sweeper cover. Afridi finishes with 2 for 18 in his four overs
on a length and outside off, Patel stretches out and laces it through the gap at cover-point. Delicious timing from Patel
full and keeps low outside off, cutter, jabbed back off the inside half
shortish and outside off, goes on the back foot and punches to short extra cover
short on off, swivel-pulled away to deep fine leg
short on off, glided to short third man
short and outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short and wide outside off, chopped to sweeper cover off the back foot
offcutter, chopped back onto the pitch and they hare across for a single
pitched up and outside off, forced back to the bowler
short and outside off, run down to deep third man
full and angling in, Shadab leading-edges it back to the bowler
pitched up and wide outside off, Patel swings for the hills... and misses
short and outside off, whipped away to deep midwicket
pitched up and outside off, scooped over extra-cover
back of a length offcutter, beaten on the outside edge
picked away off the pads to deep square leg
short and slanting away outside off past the outside edge
hip-high short ball outside off, deep square leg
full and swerves back in sharply from wide of the crease, bursts through the gate and nails the stumps. Multan coach Botha is pleased as punch in the dug out
pitches outside leg and slams the back thigh, the lbw appeal is shot down
back of a length and outside off, stabbed down to long-on
slower ball outside off, pushed to mid-off off the front foot
short and angling away outside off, chopped to backward point
yorker outside off, sneaks under the bat on its way to the keeper
full-toss outside off, skewed away to long-off. Islamabad hobble past 100
full-toss on middle, punched down to long-off
back of a length and outside off, heaved down to wide long-on
short and wide outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover's right
on a length and outside off, swung away to long-on again
full-toss on middle, driven only as far as wide long-on
full and wide, scythed to deep point
slower bouncer outside off, backs away and wafts to short third man
Faheem pre-meditates a reverse-sweep, sprayed wide outside off, not called a wide
pitched up and outside off, right in Ashraf's swinging arc. Launched over the bowler's head for a clean six
short and outside off, Ashraf swivels on the back foot and hooks it over square leg for four
near-yorker on middle, squeezed down to long-on
full and on off, smeared flat and hard, does not carry to Masood at long-off
slower bouncer outside off, he swings and misses. The result is a bye
yorker on middle, dug out to long-on
wide yorker, squeezed down to third man
off-stump yorker, dug out through point
flatter and fired outside off, pushed down to mid-off off the front foot
tossed up slower and higher on off stump, bunted down to long-on
sliding down the leg side, wide
arm ball, off the pad and rolls to midwicket
tickled off the pads to short fine leg
full-toss dips on leg stump, Charles misses the flick and takes it on the pad
full and straight, clipped away to midwicket
short and on the hips, tucked away to long leg
back of a length on middle, prodded back to the bowler off the back foot
on a length and nibbling away outside off, Charles feels for the ball and snicks it behind to Ronchi. Islamabad needed an early wicket and Maqsood provides it for them
nice and full, angling across off, Evans ignores it
dug in short and outside off, flat-batted away to the right of mid-off
back of a length and swerving away outside off, past the outside edge
pushed through on off, leans back and forces it down to long-off
tossed on middle, tapped back to the bowler
stump-to-stump line, worked away to the right of mid-on
skidder on middle, dug out to the leg side
stabbed to extra-cover
dragged from outside off to deep midwicket for three
shuffles across and nudges a slower ball behind square on the leg side
on the hips, tucked away between the leg umpire and midwicket
slower ball on middle and leg, worked away past midwicket for one
shortish and outside off, punched away wide of backward point for one
back of a length on middle, punched back at the stumps at the other end
hit to long-off
tossed on leg stump, down the track and belted away straight of mid-off. Top shot
here comes Masood: down the track and drilled straight over the bowler's head. Long-on tidies up in the end
back of a length and slides on off, leans back and punches to cover
shovelled away to wide long-off
leg-stump yorker, dug out
full on middle, clipped away to short midwicket

Evans has been given out caught behind. He calls for a review. This was a good ball from Ashraf, though. Full, angling in towards off, and moving away. There's a noise: comes from bat jamming the pad, no edge involved, and Evans survives
short and outside off, jabbed to point
slapped on the bounce to Shadab at mid-off
short on middle, tip and run to point. Just 24 runs in the Powerplay for Multan
flat on off, scooped right over the keeper's head
full on middle, reverse-swept to short third man, where Maqsood lets the ball through his legs for four
tossed-up legbreak outside off, driven on the up to long-off off the front foot
googly, which is leading-edged away to short third man
on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg
back of a length and outside off, skewed in the air and drops in front of mid-off
back of a length and outside off, punched in the air, Sami leaps at mid-off, but the ball bursts through his hands

There's a direct hit at the non-striker's end. By Shadab (who else?) He swoops down on the ball from backward point and nails the stumps to catch Masood well short. The batsman stepped back and tipped it wide of Shadab, but he just pounced onto the ball and released it swiftly
back of a length and angling in at off, Evans gets right behind the line and defends
punched on the up to mid-off
full on the stumps, driven away to the right of wide long-on
chopped from off stump to point
Evans picks out Asif Ali at long-on. Tossed-up legbreak outside off, much slower through the air, hit against the turn to the man in the outfield
full, dips, and spins away, guided to the covers for one
on the pads, deflected away to square leg
tucked off the hips to fine leg
back of a length on middle, defended back
back of a length and skids back in, cramps the batsman for room, inside-edged onto the pad
full on middle, driven down to long-on
worked to deep square leg
pushed through on middle, nurdled to the midwicket region
arm ball on middle, driven down to long-on with the angle for a single
floated up on middle, Malik nips down the track, reaches the pitch and muscles it over the long-on boundary
pushed through on middle, eased down to long-on
flighted on off, driven to the covers with an open face
short at the body, glanced away to long leg
shortish and outside off, hoicked away to deep midwicket
steered down to deep third man
back of a length, Sami finds extra bounce to beat the loose waft of Azam
short and skids back in to strike the thigh and roll away to cover
short and outside off, Malik reaches out for the ball and guides it away to backward point
punched down to long-on
short and slides in at off, punched to extra-cover off the back foot
dragged down on off stump, pulled to deep midwicket off the back foot
looped up and breaks away outside off, Azam goes after it and winds up slicing the ball over backward point
arm ball on top of off, Malik leans back and chops the ball to backward point
slower through the air on middle, Malik quietly knocks the ball down to long-on
back of a length and outside off, punched through midwicket
short and outside off, spliced over mid-off and Azam gets away
pitched up on off, Azam gets underneath the length and smears it up and over extra-cover. Boom!
back of a length and outside off, nudged to the midwicket region off the back foot
Malik jumps on top of a short ball outside off and steers it down to deep third man
short on middle, dragged away to mid-on
front-of-the-hand flipper from Shadab, too quick for Azam. Pings the pad in front of middle. That's very adjacent and Azam has to go and that's the time-out
straighter one, Russell hangs back and clips it away to the leg side
dangled up outside off, whisked away to cover off the front foot
dropped short and spins away outside off, goes on the back foot and chops to point
looped up on off, Malik stretches out and drives a single down to long-off
back of a length and angling across off, run away wide of short third man
full and outside off, Russell stays leg-side of the ball and belts it away wide of mid-off for four
wide yorker, but Russell reaches out for the ball and carves it away to the right of deep third man
short and angling across off, Russell gets right behind the line and secures a single to extra-cover
just short of a good length and outside off, punched through the line to sweeper cover for one
on a length and outside off, Dre Russell leans back, opens up his hips, and smokes it into the stands beyond the wide long-on boundary. Muscled away - this is Russell at his best
on a length and outside off, Malik mows it over midwicket for six
just short of a good length and outside off, Malik pokes an inside edge to the leg side and gets Russell back on strike
Sami bowls Russell lets out an almighty roar. Yorker on off stump, Russell clears his front leg but can't get it away. Excellent execution from Sami. Another twist in the chase
Afridi jumps across off and clips a low full-toss to Patel at short midwicket
Afridi shuffles across off again and miscues a pull behind square on the leg side
short and outside off, Malik leans back and late-cuts a single down to deep third man
back of a length and outside off, punched through the line to deep cover
short and outside off, Afridi reaches out for the ball and dabs to short third man. A direct hit could have had Afridi, they sneak an overthrow in the end
short on off, quietly dabbed to short third man
Afridi jumps across off, Ashraf sends down a beamer down the leg side, streaks away past the diving Ronchi. Ashraf tumbles in his followthrough and apologises to Afridi
free-hit: yorker on middle and leg, dug out to long-on
short on off, fended to cover
short on top of off, punched to backward point. Delport swoops down the ball, but throws to the wrong end: bowler's end
slower short ball outside off, paddled away behind square on the leg side
back of a length on middle, whipped away with the wrists to the left of deep midwicket
Afridi rolls back the years. This was nice and full outside off, he reaches out for the ball, bends his back knee, and flays it up and over extra-cover. Vintage six
Swiped over long-on for another six. What a vintage finish from Afridi. Back of a length and outside off, he clears his front leg and wins it for Multan Sultans
